title: Rhino Linux Is One of the Most Innovative Linux Distros
author: Jack Wallen
description: Rhino Linux is a gorgeous desktop that will appease both new users and those with plenty of Linux skills, as well as anyone looking to develop with the open source desktop.
cntitle: Rhino Linux是极具创新性的Linux发行版之一
cndescription: Rhino Linux 是一款华丽的桌面系统，它既能满足新用户的需求，也能满足经验丰富的 Linux 用户的需求，同时也能满足任何希望使用开源桌面进行开发的用户。
